full_summary:
# **Government Tender Announcement: Power Distribution Units (PDUs)**

## **Tender Overview**

The government of Canada, through Shared Services Canada (SSC) has initiated a tender process for the procurement of Power Distribution Units (PDUs). The scope of this tender involves the provision of 12 PDUs to meet the SSC's electrical distribution needs.

## **Tender Details**

### **Tender Reference Number**

* SSC-22-00021011:T

### **Tender Title**

* Power Distribution Units (PDUs)

### **Publication Date**

* December 6, 2022

### **Tender Closing Date**

* December 19, 2022, 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)

### **Trade Agreements**

* This tender opportunity is open to contractors who can supply goods and services under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### **Region of Delivery**

* Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)

### **Procurement Method**

* Competitive - Open bidding

### **Contact Information**

The point of contact for this tender opportunity is Raiyane Benchekroun, SSC, who can be reached at:

* Email: [raiyane.benchekroun@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:raiyane.benchekroun@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 613-324-4061
* Fax: (613) 960-6007

## **Submission Instructions**

HCOMP Material are requested to review the bid document provided at the link below:

https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_publicSace the following solicitation number under the public purchase requisition page to view the documents:

BPM017561 SSC Power Distribution Units (PDUs) - Amendment 000
